allFeatures: Lane Tracing Assist (LTA) ~ Side Impact Beams ~ Pre-Collision System (PCS) ~ Collision Mitigation-Front ~ Driver Monitoring-Alert ~ Low Tire Pressure Warning ~ Dual Stage Driver And Passenger Front Airbags ~ Curtain 1st And 2nd Row Airbags ~ Airbag Occupancy Sensor ~ Rear Child Safety Locks ~ Outboard Front Lap And Shoulder Safety Belts -inc: Rear Center 3 Point ~  Height Adjusters and Pretensioners ~ Back-Up Camera ~ Front Bucket Seats -inc: 6-way adjustable driver's seat ~  4-way adjustable front passenger seat and seatback pocket ~ Driver Seat ~ Passenger Seat ~ 60-40 Folding Bench Front Facing Fold Forward Seatback Rear Seat
